author: Brandon Cai
comment: Similar to another review below, I tried installing the application but could not find a way to access the application anywhere on my phone. Clicking on the "application successfully installed" notification brings me back to the application's Google Play Store page. This seems to be an issue with either download/install or compatibility​ with my phone.

author: Paul Vidal
comment: What can I say? Battery life is good, love the material design and animations, good, clean design, has the date and it's ewoks! 5 stars! Keep up the great work devs!
title: This is an outstanding watch face!

author: Catherine Ko
comment: This watch face suits my TAG connected band.. which is orange.. love it... but the only thing that bothers me is the autonomy.. burn mode.. what is that.. overall great job

author: Turgay Senlet
comment: Awesome watch face. Has no extra info except the time and date. Always on versions of the ewoks are even cooler (just the outlines). Ewoks change from time to time after waking up the watch. Very easy to read the time.

author: Jaymi Gibbs
comment: This watch face is great for 3 reasons-material design, cute, great ambient mode. I just wish there was a battery meter.

author: Inna Bantayan
comment: This watch face is really cute BUT please add the option to make the time format 12h and option to show the battery percentage. Nothing more :)

author: Dave Murray
comment: Brilliant, works just fine, ignore the 1* reviews from people who can't work their own tech, works just as it says on the tin! Love it!

author: Evan Radecki
comment: This is my favorite watch face

author: patrick ponton
comment: Downloaded it but can't   find it on my phone or on my watch apps is it normal

author: Zane Franceschi
comment: What more can you ask for?
title: Ewoks

author: Hunter Deardurff
comment: Does not work for your phone in any way shape or form.

author: Маръюш Сымкув
comment: What is the difference between this and the paid one?

reply.author: Romain Potier, Marine Crespel
reply.content: Hello, no différence, if you are a nice Guy, you can pay for  us :) thanks !

title: Best watch face to date

author: Patryk Przepiórkowski
comment: A very basic and good looking watch face. Currently one of my favourites.
title: Great

author: Trent Fordham
comment: I don't like military time.   Please make 12hr time an option.
title: Cute,  but........

author: Albert Esquire
comment: A fun watch face!

author: Aaron Cherry
comment: Great, looks great yub yub

author: Adan SARKÖZY
comment: I love cute Ewoks

author: Gokhan Gokmen
comment: I'm in love!

author: Amey Purohit
comment: Clean and simple.

author: Denis Covricov
comment: Very beautiful 😇

author: Jason Justiniano
comment: Is.this compatible with gear s2 if so.how do I go about installing cant seem to figure it out

reply.author: Romain Potier, Marine Crespel
reply.content: Hi, you cannot install my app because you don't have an Android wear. Your watch is powered by tizen ;)

title: Help

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: Adorable, bright faces and clear design.  I love them!

reply.author: Romain Potier, Marine Crespel
reply.content: Thanks for your review Andrew :) Yes, it could be nice for the next release.

title: Cute!

author: Ashley Sykes
comment: Love it! Any chance battery levels will be added?

reply.author: Romain Potier, Marine Crespel
reply.content: Hi Ashley. Thanks for your comment :) Yes, it could be for the next release with an option. Let's think about this.

author: john fiore
comment: Awesome! !!!!

author: eddie pearson
comment: One thing I noticed, the ambient mode notifications don't show up correctly. They hide behind the watch face.
title: Man, just awesome.

author: Vojtěch Boček
comment: Hi, OLED watches benefit from having as much pixels black as possible, so watchefaces with images similar to yours usually only show contours while in always-on mode. It also helps with the burn-in, and with the Ewoks it might even look pretty good!

reply.author: Romain Potier, Marine Crespel
reply.content: Hi, Thanks for your message :) Yes, you're right ! It will be available on the next release !

author: Garan Williams
comment: I like the bright colors, but I'm not a fan of the military time. Can you add an option to change it to 12 hour display?

reply.author: Romain Potier, Marine Crespel
reply.content: Thanks for your review Garan ! It will be available on the next release ;) Enjoy !

author: Martin Spasovski
comment: Love it!
